article_node.title: M&T Bank (NYSE:MTB) Is Increasing Its Dividend To $1.50
article_node.summary: M&T Bank Corporation announced an 11% hike in its quarterly dividend to $1.50, raising its yield to 2.7% and maintaining a low payout ratio of about 35%, which analysts view as sustainable amid projected earnings growth of 11% over the next three years. The bank’s long‑term dividend track record shows steady increases, with a 6.8% annual growth since 2015 and a history of stable payments. The article also highlights the growing role of artificial intelligence in healthcare, noting that 20 AI‑driven companies—ranging from diagnostics to drug discovery—are under $10 billion in market cap and could offer early investment opportunities. Together, the piece presents M&T Bank as a reliable income play while underscoring the broader AI‑healthcare trend as a potential growth area.
